testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Test navigation links in Header and Footer
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application navigates correctly and shows interactive elements
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or white screen, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: UI Components Test
testCases.description: Test that UI components are properly implemented
steps: Check for primary action buttons (e.g., 'Sign In', 'Get Started')
Verify input fields on Sign In page accept text
Verify navigation menu items exist and are clickable
Check that Hero section text is rendered correctly
testCases.expectedOutcome: UI components are rendered, styled (Tailwind), and interactive

testCases.name: Content Quality Test
steps: Check that Hero section has a descriptive title and subtitle
Verify Services section lists actual services/features
Verify FAQ section has questions and answers
Ensure Footer contains copyright and links
Check Pricing page for pricing tiers
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application demonstrates real content (not just Lorem Ipsum) and professional design

testCases.name: Authentication Flow Test
steps: Navigate to /signin or find Sign In button
Verify state change (loading indicator or redirection)
Check if auth token is stored (if visible/mocked)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Login form submits and handles response correctly
